reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater dress fits well and has a fitted look, with one mentioning it's great for cold Texas winter nights. The dress receives positive feedback for its style, with one customer noting it doesn't look cheap, and they appreciate its quality, comfort, and soft material. Customers like the color, with one describing it as bubble gum bright light pink. The zipper quality receives mixed reviews, with some loving it while others find it cheap. items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nah, skip this !
items.body: Fit is terrible, oversized, nothing like the photo, very cheap in person and coloring was way off. Ordered apricot and got a puke color light pink. Read more
items.author: Kelly Allie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing sweater dress!
items.body: Omg! This sweater dress is to die for. Its so flattering on a women's curvy body. Also if you are not really curvy it will definitely give the illusion of a curves because of the waist line. The material is great ðŸ‘, soft and warm. Im 5ft 118lb I brought a small and the length was perfect. Worth every penny. I plan to buy another one in a different color lol. Read more
items.author: Michael D.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Its cute buuuut...
items.body: I really like this dress but I can't stand the collar...like basically there is none LOL it requires it to stay open to a certain extent which is fine I guess but to me it kinda looks weird. The material is a good weight, not too heavy nor too light. The size is on point, I got a L and I am 5'4", 191lbs. Fits my curves and is comfortable, tho it is short!! And the zipper works well too, its just weird how far up around the neckline it goes. Overall, I recommend it! Read more
items.author: Unique

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous but isn't fitted
items.body: I am built just like the model but my chest is bigger... 120lbs, DDD chest and I'm fit. 37/27/35... and I got the smallest size and it's too big. It is made great, so soft and warm... but it's just way too big for what the sizing chart states. The arms were huge and bukly and the waist was too big... and not fitted anywhere. SO SAD Read more
items.author: Neilly

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cautious on color that arrives
items.body: It is not pale pink. It is bubble gum bright light pink. Was very soft. Gave it away to a friend who loved the color and she loved it. 2 stars only because misleading color advertisements dress itself was just what I was looking for but hesitant to try another color after this one. Read more
items.author: Rebecca

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars White sweater dress
items.body: This is a super buy! First delivery was n 2 days without prime. I purchased the white in a medium, good stretch, soft feel and good stitching! I am 5â€™ 8â€ 155 and fit excellent, still with room, not too short. Will be buying other colors. Zipper is silver and functional NU Read more
items.author: Nancy U

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Over all very cute
items.body: Over all very cute. Love the style. The front top has a open mesh that makes it a little difficult to wear without a top underneath. (For a work setting at least) Read more
items.author: Kimberly McDonough

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars The zipper is not gold colored
items.body: The dress is stunning ( great fabric and fit) but I am very disappointed that the zipper does not look the same. I was expecting a gold color and a little thicker than a usual metal zipper. I kept going back and forth to return it. Read more
items.author: Lori

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Khaki, Pink, White, Blue, Purple, Apricot, Black, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
